headline.main: Gossip Abroad of Literature and Art.

docs.lead_paragraph: Of the late Mrs. Southey the Critic says: "The Times announces the death, on the 20th inst. of one of the most accomplished writers of our time, Caroline Southey, (nee Bowles,) the widow of the late Robert Southey. The notice, however, brief as it is, is full of errors.

docs.lead_paragraph: FAMOUS PERSONS AND PLACES, By N. PARKER WILLIS. NEW-YORK: CHARLES SCRIBER. Now that the letters from Idlewild have ceased, many will read this book who would not have cared for it before. WILLIS has been more deeply respected than the world hought. Many who have habitually spoken of him slightly feel now that in their hearts they honored him, and his genuine admirers are a legion.

docs.lead_paragraph: THE HEALTH OF THE PROVINCE OF CANADA.--In Montreal on Monday there were 20 interments: Cholera cases, 4; on Tuesday 16 interments: Cholera cases, 2. In Quebec on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday the deaths were only 2, 2, and 3, showing as clean a bill of health as could he looked for in ordinary seasons.

headline.main: SARATOGA.; NUMBER TWELVE. A Loiterer's Gleanings about the Notabllities at Saratoga.

docs.lead_paragraph: I sent you a long list of celebrities some time since, but the Post-Office clerks, not aware of the importance of their charge, have either permitted it to loiter too long by the way to be of any use now, or have sent it to edify the clerks at Washington; so, in order to edify you and the public, I must write another, and for this neglect I am not at all obliged to them.

headline.main: NORTHERN MEXICO.; Revolutionary Movements on the Frontier--Neglect of the U.S. Army by the Government.

docs.lead_paragraph: The prominent events transpiring on this frontier seem to confirm the theory of HOBBRS, that the natural state of mankind is one of warfare. Mexico, like the sick man NICHOLAS describes, is battling for political life, with one foot in the grave and the other kept out by the ten-million tonic.

headline.main: NEW-YORK CITY.; The City Post-Office. THE CHOLERA. CITY OF POLITICS. CONFLAGRATIONS YESTERDAY. Grist and Marie. False Alarm. Fire in an Oil Factory. A Straightforward Milkman. Laying the Corner-Stone of a Church. Departure of the Danish Frigate. American Tract Society. The Trade Sales. SUPREME COURT--SPECIAL TERM.--Aug. 22. ASSAULT ON BOARD A STEAMER.
NEW--YORK CITY.; Adjourned Meeting of the Board of Health Committee. THE SWILL MILK NUISANCE.

docs.lead_paragraph: The committee of the Board of Health, to whom was referred the subject of the Swill Milk factory, on Sixteenth--street, met yesterday afternoon at the Chamber of the Board of Councilmen, to hear arguments and facts pro and con relative to the removal of the stables from the Sixteenth Ward. Councilmen CONOVER, KIMBARK and FRVE, and Alderman VOORHIS, of the Committee, were present.

headline.main: HAVANA.; The effects of the Spanish Insurrection-Disposition of the Captain General and of the Cubans. oba..
